summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas (DBTCA). It outlines various account types, customer identification policies, and terms and conditions for account holders. The document emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations and the responsibilities of account holders regarding tax obligations.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes terms and conditions for various account types such as checking and money market accounts.
The application emphasizes the importance of customer identification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
Account holders are required to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
There is a mention of compliance responsibilities for non-US individuals and organizations regarding tax obligations.
